companyName: The Law Offices of Dr. Michael M. Wilson M.D., J.D. & Associates - Washington, DC

description:
The negligent or reckless acts of a medical provider have the potential to change your life forever. In the aftermath of serious injuries or the loss of a loved one, you may feel as though you don't know where to turn. Here at The Law Offices of Dr. Michael M. Wilson M.D., J.D. & Associates, we understand your need to get your life back on track, and we strive to provide you with superior and competent legal representation.

At our law firm, we provide all our clients with the same compassionate and assertive advocacy with the aim of increasing the odds of them receiving the maximum amount of compensation to which they may be entitled. We have successfully fought for clients in Washington, D.C., and the surrounding areas facing medical malpractice claims, such as those listed below and more:

  • Hospital negligence
  • Surgical errors
  • Medication mistakes
  • Birth injuries
  • Bile duct injuries
  • Diagnosis errors
  • Spinal cord injuries

As medical doctors and attorneys, we focus primarily on medical malpractice, allowing you to benefit from our years of knowledge, experience and resources. In addition, our attorneys are reviewing cases of women who used talcum powders for years only to end up with ovarian cancer even though they trusted that the manufacturers of these products were making them with safe ingredients.

When you need assistance and guidance with a medical malpractice claim such as those listed above, our team is here to help. You can contact us via telephone or through our website to see just what we can do for you. The Law Offices of Dr. Michael M. Wilson M.D., J.D. & Associates also offers virtual consultations in an effort to keep you and your family safe during these uncertain times.
